Ceftazidime/Avibactam 2.5 g 8-hourly + Metronidazole 500 mg 6-hourly IN A CARBAPENEM- SPARING REGIMEN
NON E' MOLTO CHIARO QUI COME IMPLEMENTARE LA TABELLA
+ Vancomycin 25–30 mg/kg loading dose then 15–20 mg/kg/dose 8-hourly
